sentences.404-title: Oh no! The page you're looking for isn't here.
sentences.404-text: You might have the wrong address, or the page may have moved.
sentences.500-title: Sorry! Something went wrong on our side.
sentences.500-text: Seems like our servers aren't doing too well... Try again later.
